utils module

Utility functions used for quantum classifier training.

utils.plot_result(train_loss, test_loss, snapshot_dir)[source]
utils.print_losses(epoch: int, epochs: int, train_loss: Dict[str, float], valid_loss: Dict[str, float]) → None[source]

Print the training and validation losses.

Args :

epoch (int) : Current epoch. epochs (int) : Total number of epohcs. train_loss (dict) : Training loss. valid_loss (dict) : Validation loss.

utils.save_outputs(epoch: int, snapshot_dir: str, outputs: Array, labels: Array) → None[source]

Saves the classifier’s predictions and the corresponding ground truth labels at a specific training epoch as a CSV file.

Parameters:

  • epoch (int) – The current training epoch.

  • snapshot_dir (str) – The directory where the results will be saved.

  • outputs (jax.Array) – The predictions made by the classifier at the specified epoch.

  • labels (jax.Array) – The ground truth labels.
